text: 6|146|nakhamulla ella jivikaleyum jutanmarkk nam nisid'dhamakkukayuntayi. pasu, at enni vargannalil ninn avayute kealuppukalum nam avarkk nisid'dhamakki. avayute mutukinmelea kutalukalkk miteyea ullatea, ellumayi otticcernnatea olike. avarute dhikkarattinn namavarkk nalkiya pratiphalamatre atâ€Œ. tirccayayum nam satyam parayukayakunnu
